LearnerProfile.name: LearnerProfile
LearnerProfile.description: Represents information about a learner's profile.

AcademicTermEnrollmentId.description: The Academic Term Enrollment associated with the Learner Profile.

AdmitTerm.description: The academic term in which the learner was admitted to the education institute.

College.description: The name of the college associated with the Learner Profile.

Concentration.description: Specifies the specialization subject of the learner.

ContactId.description: The Contact associated with the Learner Profile.

ContactProfileId.description: The Contact Profile associated with the Learner Profile.

CumulativeGpa.description: The cumulative grade point average of the learner.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency associated with the Learner Profile.

Email.description: The email address of the learner.

EnrollmentStatus.description: Specifies the learner's enrollment status for the academic term.

HasParentalFerpa.description: Indicates whether parental FERPA block is applicable on the learner's records (true) or not (false).

HasThirdPartyFerpa.description: Indicates whether third-party FERPA block is applicable on the learner's records (true) or not (false).

InstructionMode.description: Specifies the mode of instructions of the learner's classes.

IsAthlete.description: Indicates whether the learner is an athlete (true) or not (false).

IsCampusResident.description: Indicates whether the learner resides on campus (true) or not (false).

IsDeceased.description: Indicates whether the learner is deceased (true) or not (false).

IsEnrolledInCareerServices.description: Indicates whether the learner is enrolled in career services at the institute (true) or not (false).

IsEnrolledInDualDegree.description: Indicates whether the learner is enrolled in dual degree (true) or not (false).

IsFirstGenerationStudent.description: Indicates whether the learner is a first generation student (true) or not (false).

IsInternationalStudent.description: Indicates whether the learner is an international student (true) or not (false).

IsPellGrantEligible.description: Indicates whether the learner is eligible for the Pell Grant (true) or not (false).

IsTransferStudent.description: Indicates whether the learner is a transfer student (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

MajorDeclarationTerm.description: The academic term in which the learner declared their major.

MatriculationTerm.description: The academic term in which the learner enrolled at the institute.

Name.description: The name of the Learner Profile.

PrimaryAdvisorId.description: The User that is the primary advisor associated with the Learner Profile.

PrimaryAdvisorName.description: The name of the learner's primary advisor.

Pronouns.description: Specifies the learner's preferred gender pronouns.

SecondConcentration.description: Specifies the second specialization subject of the learner.

SecondaryAdvisorId.description: The User that is the secondary advisor associated with the Learner Profile.

SecondaryAdvisorName.description: The name of the learner's secondary advisor.

StudentIdNumber.description: The identifier issued to the learner by the institution.

StudyYearClassification.description: Specifies the learner's study year classification.

TotalUnitsCompleted.description: The total number of units completed by the learner.
